api_list.name: signDocument
api_list.description: The method allows generation of the signed document with the received signature value. Client can receive the signature value by the getDataToSign method.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-sign-and-timestamp.p.rapidapi.com/signDocument"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-sign-and-timestamp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getDataToSign
api_list.description: The method allows retrieving the data to be signed. The user sends the document to be signed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://document-sign-and-timestamp.p.rapidapi.com/getDataToSign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "document-sign-and-timestamp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
